TopicTitle: Show "Clostest Approach" Nodes All The Time

Articles.Content:
It gets very annoying when they suddenly dissappear for no reason.

Would make my life much easier as in terms of getting to Eve.

Displaying closest approach nodes when the two trajectories are too far apart is one thing. Yes I agree it would help.

What I'd definitely appreciate is if closest approach nodes were displayed also when I'm on escape trajectory from the current SOI. Because even if I'm escaping I might want to rendezvous.

And finally, if I get two or more pieces of trajectory in the same SOI as my target, it might display closest approach on each of them. In different colors, perhaps.
